name: simple-history
description: A simple and minimal extension for quickly peeking and managing history.

scripts.dev: parcel src/popup.html src/options.html src/js/popup.js src/js/options.js src/css/style.scss
scripts.build: parcel build src/popup.html src/options.html src/js/popup.js src/js/options.js src/css/style.scss --no-content-hash

author: Abdul Samad
